alert.note: Alert for Hermosa Foot Hills; Northern Foot Hills; Rapid City; Southern Foot Hills; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 27 at 8:40AM MST until December 28 at 1:00AM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...West winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 55 mph. * WHERE...The Northern Foot Hills, the Rapid City area, the Southern Foot Hills, the Sturgis/Piedmont Foot Hills and the Hermosa Foot Hills. * WHEN...Until 1 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Sudden wind gusts can cause drivers to lose control, especially in lightweight or high profile vehicles. Strong winds can cause blowing dust, reduced visibility, and flying debris.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Hermosa Foot Hills; Northern Foot Hills; Rapid City; Southern Foot Hills; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills
